q: 2011. iraq's parliament has yet to ratify a new status of forces agreement with britain to allow british troops to stay into next year. prime minister Gordon Brown said after a visit to iraq in july that he would expect a further fundamental change of mission in the first months of 2009, as we make the transition to a long term bilateral partnership with iraq.
